overview_summary: All five neighboring landowners have no documented public stance on the planned development (support or opposition unknown). None hold prominent positions in local government or civic organizations. Community influence appears low across the group, with no high-influence stakeholders identified.

neighbors.name: Shirley Delta Maye
neighbors.claims: Shirley Delta Maye is listed as a property owner in Berkeley County’s Falling Waters District, per county tax records ([www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com](https://www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com/amp/west-virginia/property-records/tax#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%20Free%20Search%20,Assessor%20Berkeley%20County%20Assessor)). No public comments or actions by Maye regarding local development or energy projects could be found in news or meeting records ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/linknky/name/shirley-maye-obituary?id=58874634#:~:text=Shirley%20Maye%20Obituary%20%281957%20,sadness%20that%20we%20announce%20the)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach personally via a community liaison to learn her views and any concerns, as her positions are not publicly known.

neighbors.name: Scott and Linda Funkhouser
neighbors.claims: Scott and Linda Funkhouser jointly own property in Berkeley County, West Virginia ([www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com](https://www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com/amp/west-virginia/property-records/tax#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%20Free%20Search%20,Assessor%20Berkeley%20County%20Assessor)). There is no record of either Funkhouser making public statements about development or renewable energy in local media ([www.fraleyfuneralhome.com](https://www.fraleyfuneralhome.com/obituaries/walter-funkhouser#:~:text=Walter%20Stevenson%20Funkhouser%2C%20Obituary%20May,23%2C%202011%20at%20the%20Grant)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage this couple through a trusted community member to understand their priorities, since their views on development are not publicly documented.

neighbors.name: Ronald W. Hardy
neighbors.claims: Ronald W. Hardy appears in Berkeley County property records as an owner in the Falling Waters area ([www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com](https://www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com/amp/west-virginia/property-records/tax#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%20Free%20Search%20,Assessor%20Berkeley%20County%20Assessor)). No documented stance on land development or energy projects by Hardy was found in available public sources ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/fredericknewspost/name/ronald-hardy-obituary?id=9233196#:~:text=Ronald%20Hardy%20Obituary%20%281943%20,76%2C%20of%20Keedysville%2C%20MD%2C%20was)).

approach_recommendations.engage: A one-on-one outreach respecting his privacy is recommended to gauge his perspective, as he has not openly engaged on development issues.

neighbors.name: Dennis F. Murphy
neighbors.claims: Dennis F. Murphy (Dennis Finbarr Murphy) is associated with a Hedgesville, WV address and is a Berkeley County property owner ([law.justia.com](https://law.justia.com/cases/federal/district-courts/west-virginia/wvndce/3%3A2017cv00147/42379/161/1.html#:~:text=,amp%3B%20162%2007111119%20r%20Totalpi)). He has no known public comments on local development or renewable energy projects in the region ([berkeley434.rssing.com](https://berkeley434.rssing.com/chan-8516406/all_p6.html#:~:text=West%20Virginia%20Record%20%C2%BB%20Berkeley,DRB%20then%20filed%20a)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local resident; not a civic leader

approach_recommendations.engage: Since his views are not public, engage Mr. Murphy through personal conversation (perhaps via a mutual acquaintance) to identify any concerns or interests.

neighbors.name: Trayer T. Rudy
neighbors.claims: Trayer T. Rudy is listed in Berkeley County land records as a property owner ([www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com](https://www.publicrecords.onlinesearches.com/amp/west-virginia/property-records/tax#:~:text=Berkeley%20County%20Free%20Search%20,Assessor%20Berkeley%20County%20Assessor)). No evidence of Rudy’s involvement or statements in local development debates or community meetings could be found ([goldennuggetlibrary.sfgenealogy.org](https://goldennuggetlibrary.sfgenealogy.org/sr22_175.htm#:~:text=THE%20NEW%20SOCIETY%20BLUE%20BOOK,A)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No public profile or influence noted

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach informally via neighbors or community events to build rapport and learn his perspective, given the absence of public information on his stance.
